Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As a blademaster, you are allowed entry
to the inner sanctum.<sp:0:4:0>Feel free to take your time in there. I will
be here waiting for another blademaster
candidate to arrive.
I only hope whoever's next can live up
to your outstanding example.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You are now officially a blademaster.<sp:0:4:0>Why not go visit the hideout to spread
the good news?<sp:0:4:0>Remember, it's in Karusa Valley, north of
Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>For anyone else, I'd say that's quite a
journey, but given what you're capable
of, you'll be fine.
Besides, it's important that the Yiga Clan
knows we have a new blademaster to
look up to!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hi there! It's been a while. How are you
enjoying being a blademaster?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's rare that the Yiga sees a new member
worthy of the title. I expect you to wear it
well and do Master Kohga proud!
